alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 8:11PM PDT until August 20 at 11:30PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 1130 PM PDT. * At 811 PM PDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain continuing to fall across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Southeastern Indio, Coachella, Thermal, La Quinta, Mecca and Santa Rosa Mountain. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
